abstract: A type of object with a publisher that emits before the object has changed.
overview:
## Overview

By default an [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ObservableObject] synthesizes an [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ObservableObject/objectWillChange] publisher that emits the changed value before any of its `@Published` properties changes.

items.description: A publisher that emits before the object has changed.
items.name: objectWillChange

items.description: The type of publisher that emits before the object has changed.
items.name: ObjectWillChangePublisher

items.description: A publisher that publishes changes from observable objects.
items.name: ObservableObjectPublisher

title: ObservableObject
